EmailTemplate.name: 2019_06_Minneapolis_Ops_Conf_Invitation.2019_Americas_HOC_Minneapolis_Invite_RW.
EmailTemplate.subject: You Are Invited! Honeywell Operators Conference in Minneapolis on July 18
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
YOU ARE INVITED! HONEYWELL OPERATORS CONFERENCE IN MINNEAPOLIS, MN Dear Customers and Partners,
We are pleased to invite you to the 2019 Honeywell Operators Conference in Minneapolis, Minnesota! This is a great chance to meet the Honeywell team and get your questions answered. We’re just a few weeks away, so sign up today!
Date: July 18, 2019 Time: 8 a.m. - 4 p.m. Location: Embassy Suites Minneapolis Airport <[[https://embassysuites3.hilton.com/en/hotels/minnesota/embassy-suites-by-hilton-minneapolis-airport-MSPAPES/index.html]]>, 7901 34th Ave South, Bloomington, MN, 55425
For any questions please contact: Gus Garayzar Gustavo.Garayzar@Honeywell.com <[[mailto:gustavo.garayzar@honeywell.com]]> Phone: +1-480-257-8995
CLICK HERE TO REGISTER <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/events-listing/2019/january/2019-operator-conferences]]> Learn about Honeywell Solutions
We will highlight Honeywell’s hardware and services, including the latest upgrades, supplemental type certificates (STCs) and mandates. Honeywell Support Processes
Get an overview on Honeywell processes and how to make the system work for you. Honeywell staff will share best practices and are ready to answer your questions.
A Special Thank You To Our Sponsors! This event is open to all Honeywell customers. Please feel free to share this invitation with your flight department, friends and local aviation community.
We look forward to meeting you in Minneapolis!
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
